name: Ardeo - The First Stage
description:
Ardeo was made as an entry to Assembly 2013 Gamedev competition.

We set out to make a prototype of a racing game with vehicles that can be driven up-side down. The Rollcage games were a heavy inspiration.

This prototype contains one vehicle, one track and two game modes: time-trial mode for singleplayer and split-screen for two players.

The game is playable with a keyboard or gamepad. Use a mouse for the menus.

The team:

Game Design: Ville Valtokari and Jyri Honkanen

Visual Design: Jyri Honkanen

Programming: Ville Valtokari

Music: Harry Thind http://www.soundecoded.com/
